name: Sculpture Total Skincare
description: A simple and sleek Squarespace website built for a local skincare boutique. I totally overhauled their 23-year-old website and branding, incorporating a new logo,  new graphics, new color scheme and new technologies (including location and contact features). I only wish I had saved some 'before' pictures so you could appreciate the glow-up.

name: Roll Call
description: Roll Call keeps track of students' locations and responsible caregivers throughout their day.

name: CarFree
description: CarFree allows users to input their destination and receive a hyper-local forecast for the duration of their travel.

name: Friendango
description: Friendango is a social network for movie reviews with charts that analyze the popularity, average scores, and score distributions.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: An app allowing users to compile a list of burgers they hope to eat and which from the list they have eaten using Express Handlebars.
